overview: Their only sim was that they loved too much: lovers never stop to count the cost.  He was a young millionaire and she was only a "Bargain "Basement" girl, but they had one week of paradise that started two years of drama.  The truest, sweetest love story in years.
tagline: They played with love for one week -- and then love played with them for two years.  The sweetest love story that you have ever seen.
title: The Price of Pleasure
